Prašiče so iz plamenov rešili, hleva pa ne
06 Nov 2019, 06:02 by Danijel Cek

“Srečo smo imeli, da je hidrantno omrežje zdržalo in da ni bilo močne burje ali vetra, sicer bi imeli res obsežno katastrofo,” je o požaru v Veliki Pristavi včeraj povedal vodja gašenja Tadej Smrdel. Plameni so uničili 300 kvadratnih metrov veliko stavbo, iz katere so rešili osem prašičev, v ognju pa so končali številni stroji.



Gasilcem je bila v veliko pomoč postojnska gasilska avto lestev. Foto: PGD Postojna

VELIKA PRISTAVA > Požar se je vnel včeraj nekaj minut po pol osmi zjutraj. Domačini naj bi najprej opazili, kako se iz poslopja vali dim, takoj poklicali regijski center za obveščanje, v desetih minutah, kolikor so gasilci potrebovali do Velike Pristave, pa so se plameni razplamteli po delu poslopja in celotnem ostrešju.
“Ob našem prihodu je bil požar že v celoti razvit. Plameni so švigali skozi streho. Sevanje je bilo tako močno, da nismo mogli niti stati ob sosednjem poslopju. Zato smo najprej začeli z varovanjem sosednjih stavb in šele potem smo se lotili samega požara,” včerajšnje gašenje v Veliki Pristavi opisuje vodja gašenja Tadej Smrdel iz slavenskega gasilskega društva, tudi postojnski gasilski poveljnik.
Poudaril je, da so imeli gasilci pri svojem delu srečo, da je zdržalo hidrantno omrežje in da ni pihalo. V veliko pomoč je bil tudi požarni zid med gorečim poslopjem in sosednjo stavbo, ki je zadržal plamene, sicer bi se ti razširili. Gasilci domnevajo, da je zagorelo v pritličju poslopja, ogenj pa se je nato razširil na podstrešje, kjer se je po suhem senu razplamtel kot bakla. Domačini so še pravočasno rešili osem prašičev, drugih živali ni bilo v hlevu. Rešili so tudi nekaj orodja in strojev, vendar je ogenj uničil veliko drugih naprav: sejalnico, vitel, moped ...
Kot nepogrešljiva pri takem gašenju se je izkazala gasilska avto lestev, ki so jo pripeljali postojnski gasilci. “Brez nje bi imeli veliko več dela,” dodaja Smrdel. Med gašenjem so morali odkriti del strehe, saj pločevinasta kritina ne razpoka kot opečnata ali betonska, pod njo pa še vedno gori. Na koncu so gasilcem na pomoč priskočili še pogodbeniki, skupaj so odstranili uničeno ostrešje, kritino ter goreče seno. Od pred nekaj leti obnovljenega objekta so ostali samo še štirje zidovi.
Smrdel je pohvalil tudi vseh 29 gasilcev iz postojnskega, pivškega, košanskega, slavenskega in zagorskega društva, ki so se hitro in številčno odzvali na klic. “Delovni dan in tako zgodnja ura je najslabša možna kombinacija, saj so številni gasilci v službah,” je dodal in se zahvalil tudi delavcem Elektro Primorska, Kovoda in pripadnikom štaba civilne zaščite, ki so aktivirali pogodbeno in ostalo pomoč. Po oceni policije znaša škoda približno 70.000 evrov.


Leseni tramovi so pod pločevinasto kritino goreli kot trske. Foto: PGD Postojna
text:
The pigs were rescued from the flames but the stable was not
06 Nov 2019, 06:02 by Danijel Cek

"We were fortunate that the hydrant network withstood and there was no strong storm or wind, otherwise we would have a really extensive disaster," fire chief Tadej Smrdel said yesterday about the fire in Velika Pristava. Flames destroyed a 300 square meter large building from which eight pigs were rescued and many machines ended in the fire.



The Postojna fire escape ladder was of great help to firefighters. Photo: PGD Postojna

GREAT PRISTA> The fire started yesterday a few minutes after half past eight in the morning. The locals first noticed smoke coming from the building, immediately called a regional information center, and within ten minutes the firefighters needed to reach Big Pristava, the flames ignited throughout the building and across the roof.
“At our arrival, the fire was already fully developed. Flames swirled through the roof. The radiation was so intense that we couldn't even stand next to the building next door. That is why we first started protecting the neighboring buildings, and only then did we start the fire ourselves, "yesterday's extinguishing in Velika Pristava is described by the fire chief Tadej Smrdel of the Slavic Firefighting Association, also a Postojna firefighter.
He emphasized that firefighters were fortunate in their work to keep the hydrant network and not to blow. The firewall between the burning building and the adjoining building that held the flames was of great help, otherwise they would have expanded. Firefighters believe it was burning on the ground floor of the building, and the fire then spread to the attic, where it burned like a torch after dry hay. The locals rescued eight pigs in time, and no other animals were in the stable. They also rescued some tools and machines, but the fire destroyed many other devices: a planter, a winch, a moped ...
The fire ladder brought by the Postojna firefighters proved to be indispensable for such extinguishing. "Without it, we would have a lot more work to do," Smrdel adds. During the fire, part of the roof had to be discovered, as the sheet metal does not crack like brick or concrete but still burns underneath. Eventually, the contractors came to the rescue of the firefighters, collectively removing the destroyed roof, roofing and burning hay. Just four years ago, only four walls remained.
He also praised all 29 firefighters from the Postojna, Pivka, Koshan, Slavic and Zagorje societies who responded quickly and numerically to the call. "A working day and such an early hour is the worst possible combination, as many firefighters are in service," he added, thanking the workers of Elektro Primorska, Kovoda and members of the civil protection staff who activated contract and other assistance. According to police estimates, the damage amounts to about 70,000 euros.


The wooden beams were burning like cod under the sheet metal. Photo: PGD Postojna
